mapper.select: SELECT flight_code, airline, flight_number, phone, departure, departure_time, destination, arrival_time, price, is_used FROM TB_FLIGHT_INFO ORDER BY flight_code
SELECT flight_code, airline, flight_number, phone, departure, departure_time, destination, arrival_time, price, is_used FROM TB_FLIGHT_INFO WHERE flight_code = #{flight_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FLIGHT_INFO ( flight_code, airline, flight_number, phone, departure, departure_time, destination, arrival_time, price, is_used ) VALUES ( #{flight_code}, #{airline}, #{flight_number}, #{phone}, #{departure}, #{departure_time}, #{destination}, #{arrival_time}, #{price}, #{is_used} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_FLIGHT_INFO SET airline = #{airline}, flight_number = #{flight_number}, phone = #{phone}, departure = #{departure}, departure_time = #{departure_time}, destination = #{destination}, arrival_time = #{arrival_time}, price = #{price}, is_used = #{is_used} WHERE flight_code = #{flight_code}
